De Lima tells Duterte: 'Kung pagod ka na, mas pagod kami sa pamumuno mo' tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747317 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/747317/de-lima-tells-duterte-kung-pagod-ka-na-mas-pagod-kami-sa-pamumuno-mo/story/ "Ginoong Duterte: Kung bukambibig mong pagod ka na bilang Pangulo, kahit hindi ka naman nagtatrabaho, puwes, mas pagod na kami sa pamumuno mo!" detained Senator Leila de Lima, a staunch critic of the President, said in a statement.
